name: DESPERATE TIMES IN THE KAPATHI
description:
The Kapathi , the north west corner of the lands once ruled as part of the Domra Empire. 100 years ago the Kapathi region was the first to fall to demons and their hordes of goblinkin. Who poured down from the northland, using the Kapathi Pass through the Cloud Spires. The Kapathi fell, and the demons continues on, destroying the Domra capital in the southern edges of the Lakelands. 

15 years ago the demons left and returned north. But they left behind the goblinkin. Without the overseers this horde fell to in 

fighting. This was the opportunity for freedom. Those who had been under oppressive occupation for generations broke free and began to fight back. 

And now there is an unsettled and unstable push for reestablishing civilization in the Kapathi. But enemies and dangers abound. The threat of the demons return, the goblinkin war parties, the barbarians of the Cloud Spires have coalesced behind a new leader and eye the Kapathi as a target. The Wisdom, the nature spirit of the Great Grey Swamp wishes to build back and lash out against any encroaching civilization, the cultists who serve and worship the demons seek to maintain some hold on power, and lastly, the fools from afar who seek to reclaim and rebuild the Domra Empire from the ashes and ruin it is today. How will the Kapathians keep their world safe,free and on track toward surviving and thriving. They have rallied behind 

a few leaders who hold central lands in the stone downs and on the slopes of the great west valley. They seek to expand their 

control.
